metadata.title: Moored Autonomous Hydrophone Array Data from the Gulf of Alaska at 50°N and 145°W (PMEL Vents)

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL), Vents Program

metadata.description: Hydrophone data can be obtained by time range, original position/time, and 1-day files via ftp.  An autonomous hydrophone was deployed and collection of data files began October 1999
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To monitor the global ocean through underwater acoustics.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
